step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and down.
Great job on the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Second rep starting well. Try to keep the motion smooth and controlled.
Excellent! You're really getting the hang of the circular motion.
Fantastic finish! You completed both reps with good form and control.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Breathing deeply during the exercise will help maximize its benefits. Keep up the excellent work!
